variableName: How many kilometers did you travel by car today? (km)
Did you eat food packaged in plastic or vinyl?
How many minutes did you spend showering today? (minutes)
How many hours did you spend using electronic devices today? (hours)
Did you do any online shopping (including deliveries) today?
Did you have any food waste today?
Did you use air conditioning or heating today?
Did you choose to walk, bike, or use public transportation instead of driving?
Did you eat mostly vegetables or plant-based meals instead of meat?
Did you use a tumbler or reusable container instead of a disposable one?
Did you turn off unused lights, or unplug devices you weren't using?
Did you properly separate and recycle your waste?
